Geometric3 Class

Extends GeometricE3
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/math/Geometric3.ts:72
Module: math
Parent Module: EIGHT

Constructs a Geometric3. The multivector is initialized to zero.

    The from vector.

Geometric3:

rotorFromDirections

(
  • b
  • a
)
Geometric3 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/Geometric3.ts:944

Computes a rotor, R, from two unit vectors, where R = (1 + b * a) / sqrt(2 * (1 + b << a))

Parameters:

  • b VectorE3

    The ending unit vector

  • a VectorE3

    The starting unit vector

Returns:

Geometric3:

this The rotor representing a rotation from a to b.
